messages.message: You are now connected on Messenger.
Hey, are you automating any functions of this FB account? Is it a bot or your personal account or both?
What's the point of spam liking all my posts?
If you don't want me liking or commenting your posts just say so.

Brian
I do though!
At scale!
Just FYI liking 30 old posts all at once is creepy as hell. If you like something, please be genuine. My ideas and posts aren't all THAT good. Please be selective. Thanks!

Brian
Hmm, at least 2 people think it's creepy.
It's like a bot. If that's your point then I get it loud and clear.

Brian
Does it look like a bot from other people's perspective?
What if I only liked new posts?
Liking new posts looks human. Liking every old post nondiscriminantly within 60 seconds looks like a bot.

Brian
I need training data.
You are a special part of who I am in trying to bot myself.
Your messages yesterday are nonsensical and sound like sent by a chatbot. Please try not to sound like a chatbot. It's unsettling. Thanks!

Brian
Ha, I actually made them up in my head.
Thank you Brian. Happy Thanksgiving to you and Iga!
